sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
University of Illinois Journalism College Act.

sections.heading: The trustees of the University of Illinois are authorized and
sections.text:
directed to establish a College of Journalism at the University of
Illinois.

sections.heading: The College of Journalism shall offer such course of
sections.text:
instruction relating to journalism as will best serve to train and equip
persons for service in that profession.
